column1: The Royal Scottish Geographical Society
Series of monthly illustrated talks are held from October to March at fourteen RSGS Regional Centres.
For non-members the cost of admission to these events varies between centres, but is normally about &pound
column2: 5.00, except for students and school-pupils, who are admitted free-of-charge (in the case of students, on production of suitable evidence of their status).
Admission is limited by the capacity of the auditorium, and cannot always be guaranteed, even for members. &nbsp
column3: For some events all attenders may be required to book tickets, in which case members will be given priority over non-members.
